title: LFG Silver 5 Top/ Support Player
body:
Game Name: MrAwesomeOne
Roles: TOP/Support
Ranked ATM: Silver 5

iam on everyday and night got no life, LoL is Life!!!. all serious tho i want to find a team that is serious and on most of the time getting sick of solo q i dnt rage keep cool under pressure and never give up!!.

replies.body: haha but some people are too busy studying right Burn lol
How about you try to make your own team. Get people who you trust to play and people who you have good comms with and then maybe you can even win against teams of higher caliber.
